name: Dungeon Knight
description:
Dungeon Knight is a platform jump game in which players need to use their jumping ability to avoid enemies and traps. At the same time, you need to use some props to help you complete the challenge.

Dungeon Full of Traps


Reverse Gravity, Complete the Challenge


Calculate Jump Timing and Distance, Dodge Danger

Game Features


· Simple operation, fun adventure.

· Exquisite level design, each level is hand-drawn.

· Support all popular game handles, without any settings, just connect the handles.

· Exquisite game screen, players will cross to various styles of dungeons in the game.

· Good game soundtrack.
